hubeau 0.2.0.9000

  • Changelog

Retrieve piezometric "real time" chroniques from API "Piézométrie"

Source: R/get_niveaux_nappes_chroniques_tr.R
get_niveaux_nappes_chroniques_tr.Rd

See the API documentation for available filter parameters: https://hubeau.eaufrance.fr/page/api-piezometrie

get_niveaux_nappes_chroniques_tr(
  params,
  cfg = config::get(file = system.file("config.yml", package = "hubeau"))
)

Arguments

params

a list the list of parameters of the queries and their values in the format list(ParamName = "Param value", ...), use the function get_available_params for a list of the available parameters for a given operation in an API and see the API documentation for the complete list of available filter parameters

cfg

a config object Configuration of the communication. Use by default the internal package configuration

Value

a tibble::tibble with all available parameters in columns and one row by time step and by station.

Examples

# For retrieving the last real time observed piezometric level
# at station 'BSS001VZGZ' (new BSS identifier)
df <- get_niveaux_nappes_chroniques_tr(list(bss_id = "BSS001VZGZ"))

# Plot the water elevation (NGF)
plot(as.POSIXct(df$date_mesure), df$niveau_eau_ngf, type = "l")
